name: CandleWatch
0:
”Alexa, ask Candle Watch how many candles are burning”
”Alexa, tell Candle Watch I lit a candle”
”Alexa, tell Candle Watch I blew out a candle”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: candle watch
des:
Have you ever crawled in bed and wondered if you left a candle lit? 
Then worry no more!
Just ask Candle Watch how many candles are burning!

As you go through your day, just tell Candle Watch every time you either light a candle, or blow one out. Candle Watch keeps track of how many candles are burning and can give you a status update whenever you ask!

Candle Watch works with you in remembering to be safe! She is only aware of lit candles of which you inform her, so be diligent! Safety first!

Here are some common ways to use Candle Watch:

Alexa, tell Candle Watch I lit a candle.
Alexa, tell Candle Watch I lit five candles.
Alexa, tell Candle Watch I blew out a candle.
Alexa, ask Candle Watch for a report.
Alexa, tell Candle Watch I blew out all the candles!
Alexa, ask Candle Watch to reset.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
